name: Trivia Vault: Mini Mixed Trivia 2
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault: Mini Mixed Trivia 2 and bring your thinking hat. Answer all new mixed trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Win 7 32-bit or higher Процессор: 2.0 ghz or higher Оперативная память: 500 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 200 MB
